languages.text: {n}Вы набираете в легкие побольше воздуха и кричите что есть сил. Голос звучит звонко и жалобно. Кажется, этот крик станет для вас последним.{/n}
{n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы набираете в легкие побольше воздуха и кричите что есть сил. Голос звучит звонко и жалобно. Кажется, этот крик станет для вас последним.{/n}

{n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你深吸一口气，尽可能放声尖叫起来。你的声音悲惨地回荡着，这或许是你最后一次尖叫了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你深吸一口气，尽可能放声尖叫起来。你的声音悲惨地回荡着，这或许是你最后一次尖叫了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Inspiras profundamente y gritas tan fuerte como puedes. Tu chillido es bastante penoso. Podría tratarse de tu último grito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Inspiras profundamente y gritas tan fuerte como puedes. Tu chillido es bastante penoso. Podría tratarse de tu último grito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Derin bir nefes alıp avazın çıktığı kadar bağırıyorsun. Sesin acınası bir şekilde çınlıyor. Bu, attığın son çığlık olabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Derin bir nefes alıp avazın çıktığı kadar bağırıyorsun. Sesin acınası bir şekilde çınlıyor. Bu, attığın son çığlık olabilir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは深く息を吸い、できる限り大きな声で叫ぶ。あなたの声が惨めに響く。この叫びがおそらく最後だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは深く息を吸い、できる限り大きな声で叫ぶ。あなたの声が惨めに響く。この叫びがおそらく最後だろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous prenez une grande inspiration et hurlez à pleins poumons. Du moins essayez-vous. Ce cri pitoyable pourrait bien être votre dernier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous prenez une grande inspiration et hurlez à pleins poumons. Du moins essayez-vous. Ce cri pitoyable pourrait bien être votre dernier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du holst tief Luft und schreist, so laut du kannst. Deine Stimme klingt jämmerlich. Dieser Schrei könnte dein letzter sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a deep breath and scream as loud as you can. Your voice rings pitifully. This cry may be your last.{/n}
